main.name: Hammad Shahid
main.description: Nothing is on my horizon, except everything
main.bio: Hi I'm Hammad, I'm a MERN Stack and Blockchain Developer. I've expertise in Both Frontend and Backend Development. I can help you make your Websites, or just your backend, local API's, Server side and client Side Interactions. I can write you smart contracts, deploy and test them on hardhat, integrate them with your Dapp using Etherjs. Or If you don't have a Dapp, Don't Worry, I can help you make one.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to get my services

education.school: FAST National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences

work.title: NextJs Developer
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

work.title: Blockchain Developer
work.description: I joined Netixsol as a Blockchain Developer, this was my kick-off as a Blockchain Developer, I worked there for 3 months, The Things I worked on: Introduction to Blockchain, crypto and NFT's Smart Contract Writing Standard Smart Contracts Writing Integration of Smart Contracts with My React App using ethers library, Dapp to Transfer Tokens, Check Balance using React Writing Test Cases of Smart Contracts using Hardhat.

projects.title: Whitelisting Website for Upcoming NFT Drop
